Package com.cs408.forbes.chris.global.comms

Class Summary
Analysis_control Global comms class for merging lists of single and multi-term clusters
Grapher The Grapher class is responsible for drawing all the data onto bar graphs, this makes comparison of search methodologies easier to understand.
KeyWordDensity This class will generate the keyword density per document based on the parameters
Logfiles Global comms class, used for writing log files (allows the data to be automatically exported after analysis.
NgramGenerator This class is defined in order to take a file path to a wordlist (of the form single word or multi word temrs followed by a carraige return) and generate n grams by duplicating a list removing the [0]'th element and moving everything up one place.
TearDown Global tear down method mainly used for removing the temp files that are being generated, however may be given further responsibility afterwards
UserNameRemoval Global comms class which can be used staticlly to remove stopwords from datasets this will also include methods for removing usernames ***************************After a bit of thought i realised this was an excercise in futility, as i am processing natural language which requires stop words to provide some kind of context to the words as such i am going to refactor this class to soley remove the usernames
